author: hwright
msg: Update the RA libraries to use the new svn_repos_file_revs2() API, and rev the
RA APIs.  This patch does *not* update the protocols to pass the additional
request or response parameters over the wire.
(compat_file_revs): Implement the compatibility wrapper for older RA versions.
(svn_ra_get_file_revs): Implement as a wrapper around svn_ra_get_file_revs2().
(svn_ra__vtable_t.get_file_revs): Update vtable to include the new parameter.
(svn_ra_local__get_file_revs): Update parameters and use the new repos API.
(report_baton): Use svn_file_rev_handler_t as the handler type.
(start_element, end_element): Use FALSE for merged_revision for the file_rev
(blame_context_t): Use svn_file_rev_handler_t as the handler type.
(start_blame, end_blame): Use FALSE for merged_revision for the file_rev
interface and use the new repos API.
(ra_svn_get_file_revs): Update arguments.  Use FALSE for merged_revision for
